pageContext.claim: “First of all, there's very insubordinate. Why wouldn't he go to his is immediate, you know, he went to Congress or he went to Schiff or he went to somebody. But Vindman was a guy that when we took him out of the building the building applauded.”
pageContext.analysis: Vindman was subpoenaed to testify before Congress. He had previously raised concerns through appropriate internal channels and was not instructed by someone in his chain of command not to comply with the subpoena.
